EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-26-Toronto-Community-Appreciation-Event.ES-2017- (5 Weeks Out).EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Toronto - Stryke Target Range
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Steve Corndell, Vice President at Turbonomic, we are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on Thursday, October 26th, at Stryke Target Range.
We are expecting a fantastic summer evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, ax throwing. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Toronto Community Appreciation Event <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto]]>
Where: Stryke Target Range 738 Dundas St. E, Toronto, ON M5A 2C3 Thursday, October 26th 4:00pm EST
<[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
